product_name: Sugoi RPM Thermal Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Pairing wind-resistant, fleecy warmth with reliable breathability, the women's Sugoi RPM Thermal cycling jacket is built to help you pedal though chilly miles in comfort. Wind-resistant, double-layer front panels keeps out drafts. Wind-resistant polyurethane laminate sandwiched between the front layers creates an effective wind barrier without inhibiting breathability. Raglan sleeves and a touch of spandex in fabric boost range of motion. Drawcord hem lets you dial in fit and seal out cold air; droptail hem extends coverage in back. 2 front zip pockets and 1 zip back pocket easily store energy gels, keys, ID and other small essentials. Reflective details on the Sugoi RPM Thermal jacket boost visibility in dim light. Closeout.
short_description: Pairing wind-resistant, fleecy warmth with reliable breathability, the women's Sugoi RPM Thermal cycling jacket is built to help you pedal though chilly miles in comfort.
